text: annane nam avare unarttiyelunnelpiccu. avar an'yean'yam anvesiccariyan. avarilearal ceadiccu: "ninnaletra kalaminnane kaliccukutti?” marrullavar parannu: "nam oru divasam kaliccukuttiyittuntavum. allenkil atilninn alpasamayam.” vere cilar parannu: ninnalute nathanan ninnal etrakalaminnane kalinnuvenn nannayariyunnavan. etayalum ninnalilearale ninnalute i vellinanayannalumayi nagarattilekkayakkuka. avite eviteyan erravum nalla bhaksanamullatenn avan neakkatte. ennittavite ninn avan ninnalkk valla aharavum vannikkeantuvaratte. avan tikanna jagrata palikkanam. ninnalepparri avan areyum oru vivaravum ariyikkarut
